name: A Slime's Way Home (DEMO)
description:
Dive into this new adventure to escape this huge cave you've gotten yourself into.

As your lost and confused you'll meet new things, are they friendly, are they not? Even if they are friendly, you'll try to find the portal fragments to find your way home. 

The Controls are simple 

AD/ left and right arrow key to move 

W/space/up arrow key to jump 

Walk into fragments to collect 

This game's art and gameplay was entirely made by me, and the songs are split between me and my friend (name will not be said for privacy reasons).

Install Instructions

1-Click "Download"

2-Un-zip the zip file

3-Open "ASlimesWayHomeDemo" file that shows the godot logo 

4-Enjoy

Notice

If you leave and come back your settings might not be saved. This is my first big game and I'm still learning and in the process of figuring that out. If I update this demo that problem will be fixed, if I don't the full game will save your settings.
